author: tomi0x
content: For payload attestations, is it enough if PTC validators set `blob_data_available=true` if they have all their assigned custody columns for that block, without checking if all of the blobs are actually available?

author: bharath.vedartham
content: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4769 probably worth clarifying it in the spec then

author: tomi0x
content: we were thinking it could either be renamed to `columns_data_available` or removed entirely.

author: potuz
content: It can't be removed, the proposer for the next block needs to use this information if it's not a super node

author: jtraglia
content: Also I would like to keep the `blob_data_available` name. The blob data is what's important.

author: jtraglia
content: But I agree the naming is a bit unintuitive.

author: bharath.vedartham
content: happy to update the PR to the name folks agree upon üôè
